title: Test Statistic
question_text: A test statistic for the z- or t-distribution represents

choices.text: The probability of getting a result, or more extreme, given the null hypothesis was true.
The probability of a result, or more extreme, given the alternative hypothesis was true.
The number of standard deviations the result was away from the mean.
The distance away from the mean, using the units represented in the problem.
The amount of evidence one has to reject the alternative hypothesis.
